name: Skull Master
description:
----Gameplay/Description----

The gameplay is a classic game, it is only played with 4 buttons and by punctuation, there are no lives so enjoy this experience, I would love to know your opinion

-----History-----

Legend has it that every decade a sword appears capable of controlling magical skulls, it is guarded by the skull king, can you obtain the sword and be victorious in 20 rounds full of bones? And can you control the power of the sword lightning capable of taking long distances and too much power?

-----Control-----

"X" Hold - Shoot
"Z"- Jump
"Arrows" - Move
"Enter/P" - Pause

-----Credits-----

Artist and Programer BluesWhisper
https://twitter.com/Blues_Whisper
Music by Vanware
https://www.youtube.com/c/Vanware

-----GameJam-----

this game was made for the gamejam from AlvaMajo
